summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5652 for the improvement of North 79th Street, from Stone Avenue to Ashworth Avenue; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 74610, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
